INTELLIGENT SYSTEM LAB
STUDENT RESEARCH GROUP,
DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
Birla Institute of Technology, Mesra, Ranchi

Rediscovering the Future of A.I.

Know More

NIVRITTI

Nivritti is a student run group of highly motivated undergraduate students from diverse majors of Birla institute of technology, Mesra. Its objectives are to explore the untrodden avenues of robotics and machine learning, to initiate the culture of Research amongst young minds and to keep them updated regarding the recent trends in Robotics and Automation. We organise regular symposium and workshop on an annual basis.Providing students a platform to showcase their abilities to the world.

Projects

  • Object Detection

    A real time object detection model using SSD architecture. The network is composed of a base VGG network followed by the added multibox conv layers.

  • Neural Network Car

    An Autonomous car based on a Neural Network. It learns from its past experience and takes a decision depending upon the present situation.

  • Emojify

    A python based emoji detector(using CNN) which then replaces your face with the correct over webcam.

  • Indian-Music-Genre-Recognition

    This project is a take at the music genre recognition using machine learning, aimed at Indian music genres. The model was trained using ANN, so that it could differentiate between various genres like Bolly Pop, Sufi, Ghazal, Carnatic and Hindustani Classical.



  • More projects:

Flagship Event




ANNUAL SYMPOSIUM

on

A.I. and AUTOMATION

(COMING SOON)

          in association with           

With the goal of advancing and promoting A.I and giving our community an unparalleled opportunity to showcase their talent,this spring,we have partnered with Intel Softwares,to bring you the first ever kind of event that BIT Mesra has ever seen.We'll be up with a mega Symposium on Artificial Intelligence and Automation.Hold on to your seats and take a deep breath as we dwell into the realms of A.I and give you a mesmerising memory to hold on .
You will soon know why Spring’18, won’t be, like Spring’18.
For further information of events in regards with participation, keep an eye on this space.
